verses.verse: Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> toward the land <S%H776><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> and settled <S%H3427><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> and Shur; <S%H7793><s%> then he sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in Gerar. <S%H1642><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> "She is my sister. <S%H269><s%>" So Abimelech <S%H40><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gerar <S%H1642><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> Sarah. <S%H8283><s%>

But God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Abimelech <S%H40><s%> in a dream <S%H2472><s%> of the night, <S%H3915><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are a dead <S%H4191><s%> man because <S%H5921><s%> of the woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have taken, <S%H3947><s%> for she is married. <S%H1167><s%> <S%H1166><s%>"

Now Abimelech <S%H40><s%> had not come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> her; and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H136><s%> wilt Thou slay <S%H2026><s%> a nation, <S%H1471><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> [though] blameless <S%H6662><s%>?

"Did he not himself <S%H1931><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to me, 'She is my sister <S%H269><s%>'? And she herself <S%H1931><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> 'He is my brother. <S%H251><s%>' In the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> and the innocence <S%H5356><s%> of my hands <S%H3709><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H2088><s%>"

Then God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him in the dream, <S%H2472><s%> "Yes, <S%H1571><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that in the integrity <S%H8537><s%> of your heart <S%H3824><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> and I also <S%H1571><s%> kept <S%H2820><s%> you from sinning <S%H2398><s%> against Me; therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I did not let <S%H5414><s%> you touch <S%H5060><s%> her.

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, restore <S%H7725><s%> the man's wife, <S%H802><s%> for he is a prophet, <S%H5030><s%> and he will pray <S%H6419><s%> for you, and you will live. <S%H2421><s%> But if <S%H518><s%> you do not restore <S%H7725><s%> [her,] know <S%H3045><s%> that you shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> you and all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are yours."

So Abimelech <S%H40><s%> arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> in their hearing; <S%H241><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> were greatly <S%H3966><s%> frightened. <S%H3372><s%>

Then Abimelech <S%H40><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> to us? And how <S%H4100><s%> have I sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> on me and on my kingdom <S%H4467><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin <S%H2401><s%>? You have done <S%H6213><s%> to me things <S%H4639><s%> that ought not to be done. <S%H6213><s%>"
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> have you encountered, <S%H7200><s%> that you have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%>?"

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> I thought, <S%H559><s%> surely <S%H7534><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> fear <S%H3374><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> and they will kill <S%H2026><s%> me because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of my wife. <S%H802><s%>

"Besides, <S%H1571><s%> she actually <S%H546><s%> is my sister, <S%H269><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my father, but not the daughter <S%H1><s%> of my mother, <S%H1323><s%> and she became <S%H517><s%> my wife; <S%H1961><s%>

and it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H9201><s%> God <S%H430><s%> caused me to wander <S%H8582><s%> from my father's house, <S%H1004><s%> that I said <S%H559><s%> to her, 'This <S%H2088><s%> is the kindness <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you will show <S%H6213><s%> to me: everywhere <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> we go, <S%H935><s%> say <S%H559><s%> of me, "He is my brother. <S%H251><s%>"' "

Abimelech <S%H40><s%> then took <S%H3947><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%> and male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H8198><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and restored <S%H7725><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> to him.
And Abimelech <S%H40><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you; settle <S%H3427><s%> wherever you please. <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%>"

And to Sarah <S%H8283><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> pieces of silver; <S%H3701><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is your vindication <S%H3682><s%> before all <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are with you, and before <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H3605><s%> you are cleared. <S%H3198><s%>"

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> to God; <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> healed <S%H7495><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> and his maids, <S%H519><s%> so that they bore <S%H3205><s%> [children.]

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had closed <S%H6113><s%> fast <S%H6113><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wombs <S%H7358><s%> of the household <S%H1004><s%> of Abimelech <S%H40><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> Abraham's wife. <S%H802><s%>
